item.title: Weekly Report(2021/05/15)
item.author: Masahiro Hiramori
item.description: Look back on the week. English 今週も毎日受講 new words irritate: (…に)炎症を起こさせる、(…を)ひりひりさせる ex: irritate my skin livelihood education Technology and Livelihood Education (TLE) is one of the learning areas of the Secondary Education Curriculum used in Philippine secondary schools.
